title: Python Engineer, Truework
requirements: 2+ years of software development experience | Bachelor degree (or equivalent education/training) | Proficiency in Python and JavaScript | Experience developing RESTful APIs | Strong communication and documentation skills | A strong sense of ownership from feature design through production release | A desire to collaborate with external stakeholders | An eagerness to learn, collaborate, improve, innovate, and have fun | An A-player mindset with a strong bias for action: you raise the bar, move with urgency, stay resilient through ambiguity, and take ownership to deliver meaningful outcomes
